ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 30
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/2/1999 5:34:46 AM Central Daylight Time, bonecrkr@xsite.net writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/2/1999 5:34:46 AM Central Daylight Time,
bonecrkr@... writes:

<< How about pricing? I've been selling the basic Rough Oak recurve
bow (hemp string) for 150pp and have sold quite a few. I sold one 1-cam Oak
recurve for 200pp. Am I charging too little? Too much? What would you
sell a darkwood for? >>


okay, according to my cost info sheet, the Rough Oak recurve hemp string
costs about 85pp 9gp 6sp 6cp give or take a bit, so 150pp is a dandy price to
get on it. a 1-cam oak recurve hemp string costs 132pp 8gp 5sp, so again
200pp is a very good price to get on it. So if you are actually getting
people to pay that much for them, more power to you.

Koliana
Warrior lvl 13
Bristlebane server
